narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: John Wah is a Internal Medicine provider based in Westminster, MD. From 2018-01 through 2018-08, this provider received $100K in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 312 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 5.9× the national median for 99309 (99309), at $82 per claim vs. the median of $14. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
100% of billing is concentrated in 99309 (99309), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2018-08, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
